<html>
<head>
  <title>Subflow Documentation</title>
</head>
<body>

  <p>This subflow is designed to remove group or roles data from a user record in ServiceNow.</p>

  <h3>Inputs:</h3>
  <ul>
    <li>
      <strong>Table Name:</strong> This input removes records in ServiceNow based on the table name of the resource.
    </li>
    <li>
      <strong>Request Data:</strong> This input helps update the User Management Traceability table in ServiceNow.
    </li>
    <li>
      <strong>Request Body:</strong> Information coming from the Oracle system to remove group or role resources from the user in ServiceNow.
    </li>
  </ul>

  <h3>Outputs:</h3>
  <ul>
    <li>
      <strong>Result:</strong> Returns the required or queried response to the Oracle system.
    </li>
    <li>
      <strong>Error Message:</strong> Returns an error message if the subflow fails.
    </li>
  </ul>

</body>
</html>

<html>
<head>
  <title>Subflow Documentation</title>
</head>
<body>

  <p>This subflow is designed to remove group or roles data from a user record in ServiceNow.</p>

  <h3>Inputs:</h3>
  <ul>
    <li>
      <strong>Table Name:</strong> This input removes records in ServiceNow based on the table name of the resource.
    </li>
    <li>
      <strong>Request Data:</strong> This input helps update the User Management Traceability table in ServiceNow.
    </li>
    <li>
      <strong>Request Body:</strong> Information coming from the Oracle system to remove group or role resources from the user in ServiceNow.
    </li>
  </ul>

  <h3>Outputs:</h3>
  <ul>
    <li>
      <strong>Result:</strong> Returns the required or queried response to the Oracle system.
    </li>
    <li>
      <strong>Error Message:</strong> Returns an error message if the subflow fails.
    </li>
  </ul>

</body>
</html>
